## Preprocess the data

```{r}
library(PDATK)
library(qs)

CSPCmae <- qread('../data/CSPCmae.qs', nthread=16)

commonGenes <- findCommonGenes(CSPCmae)
CSPCmae <- CSPCmae[commonGenes, , ]

```
